text: The v3 contact search is amazing! it saves al lot of api calls, which is good for HubSpot, and saves me a lot of code. win-win!
Thanks Rahmona.  Q1: Is there any way to tell that a contact has been deleted using this method?
Q2.  In the case that the answer to Q1 is no, is it possible to update a field with the DELETE action?

Q3. If I use the deleted action with externalId=54. Then a little while later I resync the customer with externalId=54 with some different properties, I see that those properties are updated correctly.  Is this expected behavior?

Waiting patiently to be sworn into the v3 developers club, crossing my fingers and toes that some of the new APIs allow quicker prototyping without need to cache/commit (other than for reference/audit)
